languages.text: {n}Соломон устало потирает переносицу.{/n} "К сумасшедшим у меня больше вопросов нет. Зато есть вопрос, можно ли было хоть как-то остановить творящийся здесь бардак".

{n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон устало потирает переносицу.{/n} "К сумасшедшим у меня больше вопросов нет. Зато есть вопрос, можно ли было хоть как-то остановить творящийся здесь бардак".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for these mad people. But a question I would like to ask is whether there was any way to end the chaos happening in this place."

{n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for these mad people. But a question I would like to ask is whether there was any way to end the chaos happening in this place."

{n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for these mad people. The question I would like to ask is whether there was any way to prevent the chaos gripping this place."

{n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for these mad people. The question I would like to ask is whether there was any way to prevent the chaos gripping this place."

{n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."

{n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se frota la nariz con expresión cansada.{/n} «No tengo más preguntas para este loco. Lo único que me gustaría saber es si había alguna forma de evitar esta situación tan lamentable».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se frota la nariz con expresión cansada.{/n} «No tengo más preguntas para este loco. Lo único que me gustaría saber es si había alguna forma de evitar esta situación tan lamentable».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙疲惫地揉着鼻梁。{/n}“这个人明显疯了，我已经没有别的问题要问了。我唯一想知道的是，当初有没有什么办法能阻止这一切发生？”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙疲惫地揉着鼻梁。{/n}“这个人明显疯了，我已经没有别的问题要问了。我唯一想知道的是，当初有没有什么办法能阻止这一切发生？”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、疲れたように鼻筋をこする。{/n}「イかれた連中にこれ以上する質問はない。質問があるとすれば、この醜い状況を回避する方法があるかどうかを尋ねたい」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、疲れたように鼻筋をこする。{/n}「イかれた連中にこれ以上する質問はない。質問があるとすれば、この醜い状況を回避する方法があるかどうかを尋ねたい」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se frotte le nez avec lassitude.{/n} « Je n'ai pas d'autres questions à poser à un individu qui a visiblement perdu l'esprit. Le seul mystère que j'aimerais éclaircir, c'est s'il aurait été possible d'éviter que les choses dégénèrent à ce point. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se frotte le nez avec lassitude.{/n} « Je n'ai pas d'autres questions à poser à un individu qui a visiblement perdu l'esprit. Le seul mystère que j'aimerais éclaircir, c'est s'il aurait été possible d'éviter que les choses dégénèrent à ce point. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, yorgunlukla burun kemiğini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Aklını kaçırmış olduğu aşikâr olanlara soracak başka sorum yok. Sormak istediğim asıl soru, bu nahoş vaziyeti önlemenin bir yolu olup olmadığı."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, yorgunlukla burun kemiğini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Aklını kaçırmış olduğu aşikâr olanlara soracak başka sorum yok. Sormak istediğim asıl soru, bu nahoş vaziyeti önlemenin bir yolu olup olmadığı."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne reibt sich müde den Nasenrücken.{/n} "Ich habe keine weiteren Fragen an jemanden, der ganz offensichtlich den Verstand verloren hat. Ich frage mich eher, ob es einen Weg gegeben hätte, diese unerfreuliche Situation zu verhindern."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "I have no further questions for anyone who is clearly out of their mind. The question I would like to ask is if there was ever a way to prevent this ugly situation."
